tasks.task: Growing medicinal plants in the backyard
subtasks: Understanding medicinal plants and their uses
Adapting space for a garden (e.g., sunny vs. shady areas)
Collecting and tending medicinal plants (e.g., Spanish needle)
Ensuring proper plant variety (e.g., correct species like calendula vs. common basil)
Timing for harvesting different parts (leaves, flowers, roots)
Preparing and storing herbs (fresh, frozen, dried, oils, tinctures)
Making medicinal oils (e.g., using bundles in a container)
Creating tinctures with alcohol for long-term storage

tasks.task: MAINTASK is obvious—growing medicinal plants. Now, breaking it down.
subtasks: SUBTASK—Understanding medicinal plants and their applications. Then, she mentions that you don't need a lot of space, even if you moved in recently. That's a tip, but maybe a subtask under MAINTASK: Starting with limited space. Then she talks about variety—making sure you get the right species. For example, basil has different types. So, SUBTASK: Ensuring proper plant variety.
SUBTASK—Preparing fresh herbs, SUBTASK—Freezing herbs, SUBTASK—Creating herbal oils, SUBTASK—Making tinctures.
